title: 2024 Apple Design Award Winners Announced Ahead of WWDC
content:
Ahead of WWDC next week, Apple has announced the winners of its annual Apple Design Awards, honoring 14 best-in-class apps and games.


The full list of winners is available in Apple's press release. Apple says this year's winning apps were selected for their "stellar design, technical achievement, and innovation."

Apple has typically revealed the list of winners during WWDC, so this pre-announcement is a notable change.

This story will be updated with more details.
